mechanics.condition: Caster touches a creature AND Target is afflicted by one disease
mechanics.outcome: One disease afflicting the target is ended

mechanics.condition: Caster touches a creature AND Target is afflicted by one of the following conditions: blinded OR deafened OR paralyzed OR poisoned
mechanics.outcome: One specified condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned) afflicting the target is ended

description_text: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it. The condition can be blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned.
